meanings.sent1: The old car was the clunkiest one in the race.
meanings.sent2: The metal box made the clunkiest noise when it fell.
meanings.sent3: The clunkiest door in the house always announces visitors loudly.
meanings.sent4: His shoes were the clunkiest, echoing through the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The clunkiest bell on the cat's collar could be heard from afar.

meanings.definition: Awkward or cumbersome in movement or design.
meanings.sent1: Carrying the clunkiest backpack, she struggled to keep up with the group.
meanings.sent2: The clunkiest chair in the room was also the most uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: He tried to dance, but his clunkiest moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The clunkiest puzzle piece just wouldn't fit no matter how hard he tried.
meanings.sent5: The clunkiest robot on the assembly line kept bumping into walls.
